node.display_long_description:
Coloring books are a timeless, easy way for adults and kids to have fun making art. But what if you could step into the coloring book? In Color Space you don’t just color in a scene — you color inside a scene.
Equipped with a palette and a coloring wand, you’re transported into any of 20 beautiful black-and-white worlds. You fill in the world with as many colors as you like, one tree, rock and flower at a time.
As you color, the scene comes to life around you. Rivers run, birds fly, planets revolve, meteors shine. The soundscape responds hypnotically as you color.

latest_supported_binary.change_log: The Magic Attic Update! Three of our best new scenes, starting with the Magic Attic, then to the Castle Battle, then the Airship Attack!

nodes.title: Color Space: "Another World" of Coloring!
nodes.body_text: Color Space's "Another World" update is the most immersive and ambitious yet. It takes you to a distant planet where flying robots tend to strange plants, extract massive jewels from mountain tops, and pay homage to interesting deities. This update has ethereal new music, and players can now use the 'dropper' to re-use colors from the scene, plus undo and redo for more granular control of your compositions. We hope you enjoy!

node.reviewDescription:
PSA: make sure your device is running the latest OS! I made this mistake, as all prior updates had loaded automatically. Then I tried to run this update, and it wouldn’t open. The devs for this app are extremely responsive, kind, and very helpful and intentional to get you up and running again. This company clearly operates with integrity and really cares about the end user experience.

Thank you for continuing to provide fabulous updates to this wonderful app, and for caring about your customers.

Prior review: I love pretty much everything about this app, but for one HUGE LETDOWN: 
You’re in a 360 degree virtual world, you can color everything in the environment, which then comes to life...BUT WAIT, there’s only something to color in FRONT of you.

It seems a waste of the VR immersion to leave so much “landscape” un-colorable.
Yes, you make all that area a certain color, but there is no picture or detail to speak of other than the scene in front of you.

I hope that the developer will make scenes that are truly 360 degree coloring scenes, with detail, instead of the front facing only pictures which lend a 2-d feel to the whole thing. I would be amazed if I could color all the things around me, in a complete 360, not these front facing pics only. Then I truly would feel like I’m coloring my world!

If the devs do this, having some furnished interior home or apartment scenes with views out the windows or doors would be fun to color.

A great start, I really enjoy it.

developerResponse.body:
We're so glad it worked out, Analisa -- we love having you as a longtime user.  Stay tuned for more scenes coming very soon!

And thanks for the PSA to all:  Make sure your Quests have the latest firmware update!

website_page_meta.description: Color Space is the first virtual reality coloring book. Immerse yourself in beautiful, fully animated worlds, where you can color the world piece by piece and watch it come to life.
website_page_meta.title: Color Space · Oculus Quest
